workflow.name: Translate English scripts to multilingual audio with GPT-4 and ElevenLabs
workflow.description:
## üìä Description
Automate multilingual voice content creation by translating an English script into multiple languages and generating natural-sounding audio files using AI. üåçüéôÔ∏è This workflow receives a script via webhook, translates it into selected target languages using GPT-4, converts each translation into high-quality speech with ElevenLabs, and uploads the resulting MP3 files to Google Drive. It‚Äôs ideal for teams producing localized videos, podcasts, courses, or educational content at scale ‚Äî without manual translation or recording. üöÄ‚ú®

## üîÅ What This Template Does
1Ô∏è‚É£ Receives an English script and target languages via webhook. üåê
 2Ô∏è‚É£ Extracts and normalizes request parameters for processing. üìù
 3Ô∏è‚É£ Uses GPT-4 with a strict JSON schema to translate the script into multiple languages. ü§ñüåç
 4Ô∏è‚É£ Splits each translated language into individual processing items. üîÄ
 5Ô∏è‚É£ Converts each translation into natural-sounding speech using ElevenLabs. üéôÔ∏è
 6Ô∏è‚É£ Processes translations sequentially to avoid API limits. ‚è≥
 7Ô∏è‚É£ Uploads language-specific MP3 files to Google Drive with clean naming. ‚òÅÔ∏è
 8Ô∏è‚É£ Returns generated audio as a webhook response for frontend usage. üîÅ
 9Ô∏è‚É£ Triggers Slack alerts if any workflow error occurs. üö®

## ‚≠ê Key Benefits
‚úÖ Instantly localizes audio content into multiple languages
 ‚úÖ Produces human-quality voiceovers without recording studios
 ‚úÖ Ensures consistent tone and meaning across all translations
 ‚úÖ Fully automated from script input to audio delivery
 ‚úÖ Scales easily for videos, podcasts, training, and education
 ‚úÖ Clean Google Drive storage for easy access and reuse

## üß© Features
- Webhook-based script ingestion
- GPT-4 multilingual translation with structured JSON output
- AI memory for consistent translation behavior
- ElevenLabs multilingual text-to-speech generation
- Batch processing for multiple languages
- Google Drive MP3 upload with language-based filenames
- Webhook audio response for frontend apps
- Slack-based error handling and alerts

## üîê Requirements
- OpenAI API key (GPT-4 / GPT-4.1-mini)
- ElevenLabs API key (multilingual voice model)
- Google Drive OAuth2 credentials
- Slack API credentials (for error alerts)
- Webhook client sending Script, first_language, and second_language

## üéØ Target Audience
- Content teams creating localized videos or podcasts
- EdTech platforms producing multilingual learning material
- Marketing teams localizing campaigns across regions
- Creators building AI-driven voice pipelines
- Automation teams integrating audio localization into products

workflow.name: Translate English scripts to multi-language audio using AI and ElevenLabs

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details: In n8n, when a workflow execution fails, it can start another workflow. This second workflow can be any arbitrary workflow on your n8n instance. Use the Error Trigger node as your Trigger in the Error workflow.

generic.label: Creating Error Workflows in n8n
